name: Brute Clans
background: The Guilds of the Nexus are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal guild wars on the streets of the Nexus. These guilds are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular guild, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

sections.label: Replace Brute Pistol and Hand Weapon

gains.name: Master Enhanced Handgun
gains.label: Master Enhanced Handgun (24", A6, AP(1), Slam)

options.label: Master Enhanced Handgun (24", A6, AP(1), Slam)

sections.label: Replace any Brute Pistol and Hand Weapon

spells.name: Clan Spirit
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Fearless once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Plague Hex
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with AP(1) and Surge. Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

parameters.name: spellHitRoll
parameters.value: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spellHitRoll.name: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Spirit Onslaught
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with AP(1) and Slam each.

spells.name: Rapid Mending
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which get Regeneration once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Power Slam
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 6", which take 1 hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3) each.

specialRules.name: Fast Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game moves +2" when using Advance actions and +4" when using Rush/Charge actions. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Slam
specialRules.description: Ignores Cover, and on unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Brute Courage
specialRules.description: If a unit where all models have this rule is Shaken at the beginning of the round, roll one die. On a 4+, it stops being Shaken.

specialRules.name: Thrust in Melee Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Thrust in melee. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Versatile Defense Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Versatile Defense. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Shooter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Unpredictable Shooter. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Fortified Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Fortified. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Fearless Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Fearless. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Precision Debuff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which gets -1 to hit rolls when attacking once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Ignores Cover
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores cover.

specialRules.name: Thrust
specialRules.description: When charging, gets +1 to hit rolls and AP(+1) in melee.

specialRules.name: Versatile Defense
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule is deployed or activated, pick one effect: when shot or charged from over 9" away, the unit either gets +1 to defense rolls, or enemy units get -1 to hit rolls against it. This effect lasts until the units' next activation.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable
specialRules.description: When attacking, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Shooter
specialRules.description: When shooting, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Fortified
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule fails a morale test, roll one die. On a 4+ it counts as passed instead.

specialRules.name: Fear
specialRules.description: This model counts as having dealt +X wounds when checking wound effects in melee (must deal at least one wound).

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Surge
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, this weapon deals 1 extra hits (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds dont carry over to other models if the original target is killed.
